solution_line_template: The builder purchased {boxes_bolts} boxes * {bolts_per_box} bolts = <<{boxes_bolts}*{bolts_per_box}={total_bolts}>>{total_bolts} bolts.
He used {total_bolts} bolts - {bolts_left_over} left over = <<{total_bolts}-{bolts_left_over}={bolts_used}>>{bolts_used} bolts for the project.
The builder purchased {boxes_nuts} boxes * {nuts_per_box} nuts = <<{boxes_nuts}*{nuts_per_box}={total_nuts}>>{total_nuts} nuts.
He used {total_nuts} nuts - {nuts_left_over} left over = <<{total_nuts}-{nuts_left_over}={nuts_used}>>{nuts_used} nuts for the project.
Total for the project he used {bolts_used} bolts + {nuts_used} nuts = <<{bolts_used}+{nuts_used}={total_used}>>{total_used} nuts and bolts.
